In England, in the seven days to 17 January, there were 548,994 new confirmed cases (970.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 January, there were 839,074 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (290,080 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 January is 13,413,441 (23,719.6 cases per 100,000 population).
